summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BULL SAGE trading application. Backend APIs show excellent performance with 100% success rate. All required features are functional including Dashboard crypto prices (not $0.00), Journal trade creation, Cockpit briefing and alerts, and manual refresh functionality. No automatic polling detected as required.

ui_bugs.issue: After successful login, user remains on login page instead of redirecting to dashboard
ui_bugs.impact: User needs to manually navigate to dashboard after login

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix login redirect issue - after successful authentication, user should be automatically redirected to dashboard instead of remaining on login page. This is a minor UX issue that doesn't affect core functionality.
